item.description:
We did this combo-theme last year & it was very empowering for all of us!

If you want to connect with other "attractors", come.

If you want to be supported, come.

If you are attracting (Yay!), come to share & support your community.

- The Moth: In the spirit of The Moth Radio Hour, Share YOUR Story of what you attracted (& how) with ease, flow & joy.

If you don't have a story, no worries. You can learn & connect with folks who can help you!

- Group Wisdom: What is one burning question you have to attract more of what you desire?

If you don't have any, no worries. You can support folks in our community with your wisdom.

We'll breakout into smaller groups to discuss, using our group wisdom to arrive at solutions, suggestions etc. Everybody leaves hopeful, inspired & supported to be able to attract more of what they desire. (This has happened over & over in past "group wisdom" events.)

We are also very fortunate to have Yuliya Cohen with us, to provide her perspective of Law Of Attraction from an energy perspective. Thoughts, feelings & actions come from energy. Yuliya is an energy healer, medical intuitive and therapist, and the creator of the Energy Restructuring™ System.


******************************************************
RSVP "YES" ONLY if you know you are coming.

We provide appetizers & refreshments. So, to keep "green" & cost down, please RSVP "Yes" only when you can honor your commitment & show up. Many of you have been wonderful with this & we very much appreciate your support!

******************************************************

For parking & directions (via T or driving) info to Dave's loft :

(1) Go here: http://www.meetup.com/lawofattraction-us/files/

(2) Log in

(3) Scroll down and open file "Directions & Parking_BostonLOA Meetup"
item.how_to_find_us: The Moth, Group Wisdom & Law Of Attraction
